text: Warning! If your search criteria include parameters previously defined in your system (such as error codes, tags, search fields, and so on), be aware that deleting any of these defined parameters will cause the filters to malfunction. Click the Filter button. Set the search settings you want and click Action . From the dropdown menu, click Save as and enter the filter name. Then, click OK to confirm the filter name. The newly created filter appears in the Saved Filter list. To reuse the same search settings, click the filter name in the Saved Filter list, and the saved search settings will be displayed. If you want to overwrite an existing saved filter with your updated search settings, click Save to replace the filter with the same name.
title: Saving Search Settings as a Filter - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
